scripts.test:prepare: npm run test:prepare-base && npm run test:prepare-pulse
scripts.test:prepare-base: pnpm --F bridg -- npm run prepack && npx prisma db push --schema=__tests__/__fixtures__/test.prisma;
scripts.test:prepare-pulse: pnpm --F bridg -- npm run prepack && npx prisma db push --schema=__tests__/__fixtures__/pulse-test.prisma;
